TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_Pasumaq, title = Pasumaq, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pasumaq} }

S.FORM: alang Pasumaq ga niya mki sku Heto Keng atu Rayiyong go, kwara sali buwan nya ga 109 buwan, 339 hi ku kwara s'uli tayan. s'uli tayan pinspngan Gyencumin ga 94% kyan ku 320 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahun sku pinspngan Gyencumin ga 6% kyan ku 19 hi nya. pinspung na linhuyan Gyencumin ga, Paywan 92%, Rukay 1%, Bunun 1%, Amis 1%, binah lihuyan s'uli 1%. rhzyal kki'an tay mkyahu' na Pasumaq hya' ga Tjacekes. tay 'zil na Pasumaq hya' ga Yungkilu. rekisi kayal kyokay maki 1 kyokay. ssquliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan pqwasan biru 'laqi' cikuy pqwasan biru 'laqi' mrkyas tuqi 'san basu kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbahu Ubuy qqmayh

alang Pasomaq ga niya mki sko Heto Keng ato Rayiyong go, kwara sali bowan nya ga 109 bowan, 339 hi ko kwara s'oli tayan. s'oli tayan pinspngan Gyencomin ga 94% kyan ko 320 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahon sko pinspngan Gyencomin ga 6% kyan ko 19 hi nya. pinspong na linhoyan Gyencomin ga, Paywan 92%, Rokay 1%, Bonon 1%, Amis 1%, binah lihoyan s'oli 1%. rhzyal kki'an tay mkyaho' na Pasomaq hya' ga Tjacekes. tay 'zil na Pasomaq hya' ga Yongkilo. rekisi kayal kyokay maki 1 kyokay. ssqoliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan pqwasan biro 'laqi' cikoy pqwasan biro 'laqi' mrkyas toqi 'san baso kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbaho Uboy qqmayh
